content.p: The Rising Star award is new for the 2024 awards. It is the first to focus on the universityâ€™s KE talent pipeline and create role models to inspire future KE leaders. There is one award per faculty. This special award recognises an academic who, over the course of their career, can clearly evidence a sustained engagement in knowledge exchange for the benefit of industry and commerce and/or society. The winner of this award will be announced at the ceremony. Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
